SEARCH
Package JAVA

Class ToDoListManager

java.lang.Object
JAVA.ToDoListManager
public class ToDoListManager extends Object
A program to manage a to-do list.

Users can add tasks, remove tasks, view the list, save to a file, and load from a file.

Version:
1.0
Author:
YourName

  • Method Details

    • addTask

      public void addTask(String task)
      Adds a new task to the to-do list if it is unique.
      Parameters:
      task - the task to be added

    • removeTask

      public void removeTask(int index)
      Removes a task from the to-do list by its index.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the task to be removed (0-based)

    • viewTasks

      public void viewTasks()
      Displays all tasks in the to-do list.

    • saveTasks

      public void saveTasks(String filename)
      Saves the to-do list to a file.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the file to save the tasks to

    • loadTasks

      public void loadTasks(String filename)
      Loads the to-do list from a file.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the file to load the tasks from

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method to provide a menu and interact with the user.
      Parameters:
      args - command-line arguments (not used)
